email.emailSafetySubtitle: Configure general email safety settings, such as maximum number of emails sent per day, delay before sending the first email etc.
email.emailsPerDay: Maximum emails sent by a user in a day
email.emailsPerDayTooltip: Set the maximum number of emails that can be sent per day. This will prevent mail servers from treating your emails as high-volume mass mail, make emails go out more gradually, and allow you to promptly handle the responses. We recommend keeping this under 200 emails
email.emailsPerMinuteTooltip: Set the maximum number of emails that could be sent via this email account per minute. For example, for Outlook accounts, keep it lower than 30. We recommend keeping it lower than 30
email.limitValidation: It‚Äôs recommended that this field does not exceed emails/day limit.
email.minimumPerDay: This field requires a minimum of one (1) email per day.
email.minimumPerMinute: This field requires a minimum of one (1) email per minute.

leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__MEETING: The lead accepted a meeting, and I need to schedule it

tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__CONTACTED: Used for when you have a correct contact. You got in touch with the right person
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__DISCARDED: Used for when the qualifying questions indicate the company is not a potential client. This will set all leads within the company to Discarded status as well
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__ENGAGED: Used for when one of the leads has the status Engaged. The company status then changes accordingly.
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__MEETING: Used for when you schedule a meeting between a lead and the Account Executive
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__NURTURING: Used for when it has not been possible to contact any lead within the cadence period. This will set all leads within the company to Nurturing status as well.
tooltipDictionary.DEFAULT_TEXT: The lead and company status are closely related, therefore depending on the selected lead status the company status may change as well
tooltipDictionary.HEADER_TEXT: The lead and company status are closely related, therefore depending on the selected lead status the company status may change as well
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__CONTACTED: Used for when you got in touch with the lead
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__DISCARDED: Used for when the lead is not a suitable contact to continue prospecting with
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__ENGAGED: Used for when the lead is interested and has answered the qualifying questions
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__MEETING: Used for when you have scheduled a meeting between the lead and the Account Executive
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__NURTURING: Used for when you were not able to contact the lead within the cadence period but you want to try again later

playbook.buyerPersonaDefinition: A buyer persona is a fictional representation of your ideal client or target audience! There are multiple Buyer personas within a target company. For example, our location intelligence software client has identified sales managers, trade marketing managers, and brand managers as their ideal buyers within FMCG target companies.

playbook.scenarioDefinition: Scenarios are different use cases for your solution depending on the current problem encountered daily by your client. changeStatus.companiesStatusMessage: The selected company status will stop the cadence. All future communication needs to be scheduled manually and should be based on what you discussed during your call.

leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__CONTACT: I need to create an opportunity or review an existing one
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__CONTACT_NO_CREATE_LEAD: The lead has become a new contact to create a future opportunity
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__CONTACTED: I got in touch with the lead, but they aren't interested yet
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__DISCARDED: I should stop contacting the lead and discard them
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__ENGAGED: I got in touch with the lead, they're interested!
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__MEETING: The lead accepted a meeting, and I need to schedule it
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__NURTURING: I should stop contacting the lead and try again in the future
leadStatusTexts.LEAD__STATUS__ON_PROSPECTION: I couldn't reach the lead yet and I want to keep trying

tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__CONTACTED: Used for when you have a correct contact. You got in touch with the right person
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__DISCARDED: Used for when the qualifying questions indicate the company is not a potential client. This will set all leads within the company to Discarded status as well
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__ENGAGED: Used for when one of the leads has the status Engaged. The company status then changes accordingly.
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__MEETING: Used for when you schedule a meeting between a lead and the Account Executive
tooltipDictionary.COMPANY__STATUS__NURTURING: Used for when it has not been possible to contact any lead within the cadence period. This will set all leads within the company to Nurturing status as well.
tooltipDictionary.DEFAULT_TEXT: The lead and company status are closely related, therefore depending on the selected lead status the company status may change as well
tooltipDictionary.HEADER_TEXT: The lead and company status are closely related, therefore depending on the selected lead status the company status may change as well
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__CONTACTED: Used for when you got in touch with the lead
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__DISCARDED: Used for when the lead is not a suitable contact to continue prospecting with
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__ENGAGED: Used for when the lead is interested and has answered the qualifying questions
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__MEETING: Used for when you have scheduled a meeting between the lead and the Account Executive
tooltipDictionary.LEAD__STATUS__NURTURING: Used for when you were not able to contact the lead within the cadence period but you want to try again later
